CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded view for profile card
CurrentVersion.description: With the expanded view of the profile card, users will now be able to see a richer view of a person's profile, such as their contact data, custom properties, and their LinkedIn information. This expansion also enables the user to view richer organization chart information about the person they are interacting with, without leaving the context they are in. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded view for profile card
OldVersion.description: With the expanded view of the profile card, users will now be able to see a richer view of a person's profile, such as their contact data, custom properties, and their LinkedIn information. This expansion also enables the user to view richer organization chart information about the person they are interacting with, without leaving the context they are in. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply Purview Message Encryption branding with DLP policy (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Purview Messaging Encryption supports customized branding templates for encrypted mail sent to external recipients. The functionality is being brought to Data Loss Prevention from Exchange mail flow rule. In addition, DLP policies provide additional configuration to control whether Microsoft 365 external recipients will be able to view the encrypted mail inline using Outlook or the encrypted portal experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Apply Purview Message Encryption branding with DLP policy (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Purview Messaging Encryption supports customized branding templates for encrypted mail sent to external recipients. The functionality is being brought to Data Loss Prevention from Exchange mail flow rule. In addition, DLP policies provide additional configuration to control whether Microsoft 365 external recipients will be able to view the encrypted mail inline using Outlook or the encrypted portal experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to recommend course to groups in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to recommend course to groups
OldVersion.description:
Allows users to use existing user groups while
making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Office Scripts now available in Government Community Cloud (GCC)
CurrentVersion.description: Office Scripts enable users with all levels of Excel experience, from beginners to those with advanced coding expertise, to automate repetitive spreadsheet tasks in Excel. Scripts can be created with the Action Recorder or the Code Editor using the Office Scripts API and run in an Excel workbook. Office Scripts will soon become available to GCC users on Windows, Mac, and the web.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Office Scripts now available in Government Community Cloud (GCC)
OldVersion.description: Office Scripts enable users with all levels of Excel experience, from beginners to those with advanced coding expertise, to automate repetitive spreadsheet tasks in Excel. Scripts can be created with the Action Recorder or the Code Editor using the Office Scripts API and run in an Excel workbook. Office Scripts will soon become available to GCC users on Windows, Mac, and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Download learner's progress data in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Allow admins to download learners progress data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Download Learner's progress data
OldVersion.description: Allow admins to download learners progress data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
OldVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

OldVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
OldVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Home
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Home is the home for the Viva suite on the web. Accessible via microsoft365.com app launcher and app explorer, it provides a single landing destination on the web for Viva users with the goal to help with education, discovery and navigation to licensed Viva modules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Home
OldVersion.description:
Viva Home is the home for the Viva suite on the web.
Accessible via microsoft365.com app launcher and app explorer, it provides a
single landing destination on the web for Viva users with the goal to help with
education, discovery and navigation to licensed Viva modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
CurrentVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
OldVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Discover feed for channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can access a personalized feed based on important updates in the channels they are a part of.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Discover feed for channels
OldVersion.description:
Users
can access a personalized feed based on important updates in the channels they
are a part of.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Out-of-box Advanced Hunting queries for Data Loss Prevention incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can click the "Go Hunt” dropdown from the DLP alert page in Microsoft 365 Defender and select from a list of pre-populated queries for common scenarios such as understanding if a file is shared externally, participants of a Teams meetings, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Adding matched attachment details in Activity Explorer for Data Loss Prevention rules in Exchange
OldVersion.description: With this feature, the admins can see more information like name, size, labels about the attachments present in the email that violated the Data Loss Prevention rules.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: OneDrive for Business Opens in-app for Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Quickly access your OneDrive without having to leave Outlook! Previously, the OneDrive button in Outlook opened a new tab for OneDrive; with this change, you will see OneDrive inline for a consistent and fast experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
CurrentVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Admin Center: Improved issue details for service health
OldVersion.description:
We are introducing a new version of the service health issue details pane (the surface that appears when you click on a service incident or service advisory to view details).

The new version substantially reduces the amount of duplicated text and brings key information forward with improved formatting.  This gives you quicker access to the information you need, reducing the time and effort required to get up to speed on service incident details.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Registration Form Updates in Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can rearrange the sequence of registration form questions that are presented to attendees during the webinar registration process. The questions available for reordering include address, city, state, zip/post code, country/region, job title organization, industry, and custom questions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft Copilot with Graph-grounded chat usage metrics will be included in the Copilot for Microsoft 365 Usage report. This new feature provides additional usage insights and informs adoption strategy decisions for Microsoft Copilot in your organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connected actions - Viva Pulse integration into Viva Insights Leader deep dive reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,Leaders can send Viva Pulse surveys tailored to new out-of-the-box reports from the Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams at anytime to add additional context to workplace metrics.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New options to copy email items in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're thrilled to introduce two new ways to copy email items in the new Outlook for web and Windows that will make your email management even more seamless and efficient.  Ctrl + Drag and Drop: Simply hold down the Ctrl key while dragging and dropping your email items to effortlessly duplicate them. It's a quick and intuitive way to manage your emails with precision.  Ctrl C + Ctrl V: For those who prefer the classic copy-and-paste method, we've got you covered! Just use Ctrl C to copy the email item and Ctrl V to paste it wherever you need.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New context menu experience in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're thrilled to bring you an enhanced folder creation experience! In this update, we've introduced a more intuitive way to manage your folders and accounts. Starting soon, the creation links will be removed, streamlining your interface for a cleaner and more efficient workspace.  What's New: A new ellipsis icon will appear in your left nav bar when hovering the folders and accounts for a quick and easy way to create folders, subfolders or execute the existing folder and account actions ensuring a smoother workflow.  As part of this update, we'll be removing creation links to provide a more focused and user-friendly experience. Rest assured, the traditional right-click method will still be available for your convenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Expanded view for profile card

This expansion also enables the user to view richer organization chart information about the person they are interacting with, without leaving the context they are in. Note: The launch state was incorrect and has now been changed to reflect the correct state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
